Back at the desk; and belive it or not,
it was good to be back* This is about the
longest time I*ve ever been away* The boat
trip back was smooths and gave us an opportanity
to get some rest* Best regards to you from
Arthur Bardos. We had lunch with him the day
before we left Vienna and talked about a lot
of things, • *ineluding the problems Austria
faces now that it is on the threshold of freedom.
